pages.text: The Mandrake is one of the most unusual plants a wizard may encounter on their journey. Though cultivated like any other crop, it is truly unique – the magical properties of the Mandrake have made its root one of the most vital ingredients in any practitioner's stock. $(l)$(br2)WARNING: Harvest only at night!$()
A fully matured Mandrake, ready for the extraction of its root from the ground.

The Mandrake root is one of the most commonly used alchemical ingredients, employed in processes of all kinds, from potion brewing to curse rituals. Some particularly brave herbalists even prepare it for consumption, like potatoes or beets. $(l)The root is alive – beware of its awakening!$()
The Mandrake root, extracted from the ground and, evidently, not too pleased with this circumstance.
